content.rendered:
Requirement

  • Any degree
  • At least one year of experience in advising and counseling university students.
  • Excellent communication, interpersonal and counseling skills.
  • Knowledge of academic programs in area to be served.
  • Demonstrated ability to make sound analytical judgment and to work without close supervision
  • If anyone is interested kindly send your updated resume to jobopenings@irez.in.
